title: The Keepers
description: After young Connor is gifted with superhuman abilities, her life changes. When she learns of others like her, Connor sets on a path to discover her true origin.Soon, she understands that her whole life has been a lie. The dreaded Inhumans, who have been here for longer than anyone can remember, are coming for her. And among them, a powerful adversary only known as Ronin.In a world of powerful villains and fragile friendships, are Connor's powers a gift or a curse?★★★★★ - "Witty and engaging."★★★★★ - "An excellent young adult paranormal novel."★★★★★ - "Looking forward to the sequel."
author: Dormaine G.
